nz.co.jedsimson.lgp.core.evolution.operators.mutation.macro

Class MacroMutationOperator<TProgram,TOutput extends Output<TProgram>,TTarget extends Target<? extends TProgram>>

  • MutationOperator
    • nz.co.jedsimson.lgp.core.evolution.operators.mutation.macro.MacroMutationOperator<TProgram,TOutput,TTarget>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module

    public class MacroMutationOperator<TProgram,TOutput extends Output<TProgram>,TTarget extends Target<? extends TProgram>>
extends MutationOperator

    A class MutationOperator implementation that performs effective macro mutations.

    For more information, see Algorithm 6.1 from Linear Genetic Programming (Brameier, M., Banzhaf, W. 2001).

    Note that insertionRate + deletionRate should be equal to 1.

    See Also:
    class MutationOperator

    • Constructor Detail

      • MacroMutationOperator

        public MacroMutationOperator(@NotNull
                             EnvironmentFacade<TProgram,TOutput,TTarget> environment,
                             double insertionRate,
                             double deletionRate,
                             @NotNull
                             MutationStrategyFactory<TProgram,TOutput,TTarget> mutationStrategyFactory)

        Creates a new class MacroMutationOperator with the given environment, insertionRate, deletionRate, and mutationStrategyFactory.

        Parameters:
        environment - An environment that the mutation is occurring in.
        insertionRate - The probability with which instructions should be inserted.
        deletionRate - The probability with which instructions should be deleted.
        mutationStrategyFactory - A factory that can be used to get a class MutationStrategy to delegate the mutation to.
        See Also:
        class MacroMutationOperator

      • MacroMutationOperator

        public MacroMutationOperator(@NotNull
                             EnvironmentFacade<TProgram,TOutput,TTarget> environment,
                             double insertionRate,
                             double deletionRate)

        Creates a new class MacroMutationOperator with the given environment, insertionRate, and deletionRate.

        The class MacroMutationOperator will use the default mutation strategy factory (MacroMutationStrategyFactory).

        See Also:
        class MacroMutationOperator, class MacroMutationOperator
